biocontainers.name: suppa
biocontainers.summary: A tool to study splicing across multiple conditions at high speed and accuracy.

biotools.summary: This tool generates Alternative Splicing (AS) events from an annotation and calculates the PSI ("Percentage Spliced In") value for each event exploiting fast quantification of transcript abundances from multiple samples.

bioschemas.name: SUPPA
bioschemas.summary: This tool generates Alternative Splicing (AS) events from an annotation and calculates the PSI ("Percentage Spliced In") value for each event exploiting fast quantification of transcript abundances from multiple samples.
